catalog_info.title: India Electric Vehicle Population Data
catalog_info.description:
This dataset provides information on electric vehicle (EV) populations. It includes details about vehicle characteristics, location, and eligibility for clean air vehicle incentives. 

**Technical Summary:** The dataset contains the following columns: `census_tract` (census tract identifier), `city` (city name), `cafv_eligibility` (clean alternative fuel vehicle eligibility status), `county` (county name), `vehicle_id` (unique vehicle identifier), `electric_range` (electric range of the vehicle), `electric_utility` (electric utility provider), `ev_type` (type of electric vehicle - BEV, PHEV, etc.), `legislative_district` (legislative district), `make` (vehicle make), `model` (vehicle model), `model_year` (vehicle model year), `postal_code` (postal code), `state` (state name), `vin` (vehicle identification number), and `vehicle_location` (geographic coordinates of the vehicle).

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: District level data across India, with sample locations including districts represented by IDs '1.0', '10.0', '11.0', '12.0', '13.0' and codes 'AB', 'AE', 'AK', 'AL', 'AP'.
